動物用藥品名稱: 維奧雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎活毒混合疫苗(LASOTA株+H120株)
地址: INDUSTRIAL ZONE P.O. BOX 300 OR-AKIVA 30600, ISRAEL
效能(適應症): 預防雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎。
ingredients: NEWCASTLE DISEASE(ND) LENTOGENIC VIRUS, LA SOTA STRAIN: AT LEAST…10^7.0 EID50; INFECTIOUS BRONCHITIS(IB) H120 STRAIN: AT LEAST…10^3.5 EID50; LACTALBUMIN HYDROLISATE: AT MOST…0.046MG; LACTOSE:0.25MG.
